name: WP Slugify
author: Zlatko Hristov

sections.description: Extends the default WP slug generate functionality and rewrite slug in to latin characters. Plugin is totally inspired by cocur/slugify and using their charsets.
sections.installation:
The quickest method for installing the importer is:

  1. Visit Tools -> Import in the WordPress dashboard
  2. Click on the WordPress link in the list of importers
  3. Click “Install Now”
  4. Finally click “Activate Plugin & Run Importer”

If you would prefer to do things manually then follow these instructions:

  1. Upload the wordpress-importer folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the Tools -> Import screen, click on WordPress
sections.faq:
Plugin not work

After install and activate plugin, visit plugin setting page via Settings :: WP Slugify
